General.Name: Shandong Hongchuang Aluminum Industry Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Hongchuang Aluminum Industry Holding Company Limited manufactures and sells aluminum products in China. The company offers casting coils, cold rolling coils, household foils, beer wrap foils, pharmaceutical foils, container foils, and decorative foils. It also exports its products to approximately 60 countries. The company was formerly known as Loften Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shandong Hongchuang Aluminum Industry Holding Company Limited in May 2017. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Binzhou, China.

4.Name: Ms. Xiao  Xiao
4.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Non-Independent Director
